titles.title: Child Prostitution and Sexual Abuse Prevention Act of 1993
To amend title 18, with respect to travel for illegal sexual activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 11/10/1993--Introduced. Child Prostitution and Sexual Abuse Prevention Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal criminal code to impose penalties upon U.S. citizens or resident aliens who travel in interstate or foreign commerce, or conspire to do so, for the purpose of engaging in any sexual act with a person under age 18 which would be in violation of Federal sexual abuse provisions if such act occurred in the special maritime and territorial jurisdiction of the United States.
